fatemaster:SuitcaseFgo.NAME: Suitcase
fatemaster:SuitcaseFgo.FLAVOR: A device that records information on all summoned Heroic Spirits.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain [E] and #b20% #yfgomaster:NP. After each act, gain an additional #b10% #yfgomaster:NP.

fatemaster:UnregisteredSpiritOrigin.NAME: Unregistered SO
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, if #b2+ enemies are present, gain #b12 #yBlock.

fatemaster:AstrologicalTeapot.NAME: Astrological Teapot
fatemaster:AstrologicalTeapot.FLAVOR: Drink it and deepen the bonds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rSuitcase. At the start of your 2nd turn, gain [E] [E] and #b80% #yfgomaster:NP.

fatemaster:HalloweenRoyalty.NAME: Mystic Code
fatemaster:HalloweenRoyalty.FLAVOR: A prestigious and noble product. Now you can be the (Halloween) Crown Prince!
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 turns, use Mystic Code's Master skill.
Every #b5 turns, use Mystic Code's Master skill(+).

fatemaster:CommandSpell.NAME: Command Spell
fatemaster:CommandSpell.FLAVOR: Command Spells are extremely powerful magic granted to each Master.
DESCRIPTIONS: Command Spell are the three absolute commands which can be used with the #yRight click in Battle.
Repair Spirit Origin
Heal #b30 HP.
Release Noble Phantasm
Gain #b100% #yNP.
Restore Spirit Origin
When you would die, heal all HP and gain #b300% #yNP. Use #r3 Command Spells.

fatemaster:DecisiveBattleUniform.NAME: Decisive Battle Uniform
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRight click to use Mystic Code's Master skill. Whenever you enter a Rest Site or open a chest, gain #b1 usage count.
#yRight click to use Mystic Code's Master skill(+). Whenever you enter a Rest Site or open a chest, gain #b1 usage count.

fatemaster:SurpriseChocolate.NAME: Surprise Chocolate
fatemaster:SurpriseChocolate.FLAVOR: The first time seems like just an attempt... let's do it again!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 random buff.

fatemaster:LockChocolate.NAME: Lock Chocolate
fatemaster:LockChocolate.FLAVOR: Make a choice and give it to someone important to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yfgomaster:Evil_Curse.

fatemaster:SaveStone.NAME: Save Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #yGold equal to your #b
% #yGold.

fatemaster:BlessRockChoco.NAME: Blessed Lock-On Choco
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card is at or above #b3, reduce its cost by #b1 this turn.

fatemaster:PoisonApple.NAME: Poison Apple
fatemaster:PoisonApple.FLAVOR: An apple that looks suspicious no matter how it looks. The person who takes this and is willing to eat it must be a super good person.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yBlock, apply #b1 #yPoison to a random enemy.

fatemaster:MisoPotato.NAME: Miso Potato
fatemaster:MisoPotato.FLAVOR: Smuggled from the ZHIFU Mountains and circulated as simple food on the black market.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yIt's #yInevitable apply #b2 #yfgomaster:Combust to ALL enemies for each damage.

fatemaster:FanNight.NAME: Fan Night
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you break an enemy's #yBlock the first time each combat, heal for #b20% of your MAX HP.

fatemaster:BurgerKing.NAME: Burger King
fatemaster:BurgerKing.FLAVOR: Since protein can be converted into muscle, that's definitely 0 calories.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b25 and obtain a unique #rCurse.

fatemaster:DreamChip.NAME: Dream Chip
fatemaster:DreamChip.FLAVOR: A luxurious casino chip carrying dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile the first time each combat, add a #yCalculated #yGamble into your hand.

fatemaster:CosmicMedallion.NAME: Cosmic Medallion
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is not removed at the start of your next #b3 turn.

fatemaster:MidsummerNightDream.NAME: Midsummer Night Dream
fatemaster:MidsummerNightDream.FLAVOR: While these visions did appear. And this weak and idle theme, no more yielding but a dream.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer become #yfgomaster:Evil_Curse.

fatemaster:Salem.NAME: Existence Outside the Domain
DESCRIPTIONS: For each #rForeigner in your deck, at the start of each turn gain #b
#yVigor.
You have no #rForeigner.
You have #b
#rCurses.

fatemaster:SkullCandy.NAME: Skull Candy
fatemaster:SkullCandy.FLAVOR: Candy that has been resold multiple times.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUpgrade your Mystic Code's Master skill.

fatemaster:ArchetypeORT.NAME: Archetype ORT
fatemaster:ArchetypeORT.FLAVOR: A lifeform designed (or created) by fusing ORT's heart with an extraterrestrial species.
DESCRIPTIONS: Converts your #yfgomaster:Invincibility to #yfgomaster:Anti-Purge_Defense. At the start of your 2nd turn and after each turn, gain #b10 fgomaster:Stars and #b3% fgomaster:NP.

fatemaster:Avenger.NAME: Avenger
fatemaster:Avenger.FLAVOR: As an avenger, this skill is born from the accumulation of human resentment and grudges.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked, gain additional #yfgomaster:NP equal to #b30% damaged. At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yFrail.

fatemaster:OblivionCorrection.NAME: Oblivion Correction
fatemaster:OblivionCorrection.FLAVOR: Though humans are forgetful creatures, an avenger never forgets.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have #yVigor, deal #b30% more Attack damage.

fatemaster:SelfReplenishmentMagic.NAME: Self-Replenishment
fatemaster:SelfReplenishmentMagic.FLAVOR: Mana will continue to surge until the revenge is complete.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain additional #b6% #yfgomaster:NP.

fatemaster:BB.NAME: BB
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain Buff or Debuff. Buff: gain #b2 #yStrength and #yDexterity. Debuff: gain #b1 #yVulnerable, #yFrail or #yWeak.

fatemaster:BowInsignia.NAME: Bow Insignia
fatemaster:BowInsignia.FLAVOR: A seal engraved with the Archer emblem.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you attempt to add a #yfgomaster:Noble_Phantasm card by clicking, instead draw #b3 cards.

fatemaster:MechanicalProtector.NAME: Mechanical Protector
fatemaster:MechanicalProtector.FLAVOR: Employ specialized structures to facilitate joint flexion and extension.
DESCRIPTIONS: Take #b30 damage for you.
This relic has been used up.

fatemaster:LockChocolateStrawberry.NAME: Strawberry Chocolate
fatemaster:LockChocolateStrawberry.FLAVOR: Carefully select the recipient of the gift.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, your first #yfgomaster:Evil_Curse heals you instead.
